elements.text: The oval function draws an empty oval.

x0
  X coordinate of the top left corner of the
  oval.
y0
  Y coordinate of the top left corner of the
  oval.
x1
  X coordinate of the bottom right corner of
  the oval.
y1
  Y coordinate of the bottom right corner of
  the oval.
col
  The color of the circle.

The ovalfill() function behaves exactly the
same as oval() and takes the same arguments, but
the oval it draws is filled in.
